text: I am here!
I have come!
Merasmus has risen!
Cower fools! Merasmus is here!
Run fools! Run from Merasmus!
Merasmus the Wizard has come for your souls!
(evil laughter)
(wicked laughter)
(diabolical laughter)
Soldier! Never anger a magician!
Welcome. To your doom!
DOOM! All of you are doomed!
Enjoy Halloween mortals, for it will be your last!
Merasmus arrives on a tide of blood! *sotto voce* Oh hello, Soldier.
Arrr!
Rarrr!
Rharr!
Hah!
Plah!
Uh huh hah!
Rahhh!
Mortis Attagstah!
Staffus Attackum!
Hehrrr!
You cannot run!
Run fools!
You're all fools!
Hurlus bombinus!
Mortis Longdistimus!
Bombinomicon! Destroy them!
By the power...of the Bombinomicon!
Booooooombinomicon!
Forbidden book! I unchain thee!
Cower before the Bombinomicon!
Beebus Barrasbus Bombinomicon!
Bombinomicon! Heed my call!
Feel the terror...of reading!
Feel the terror...of books!
Heads up!
Fire in the hole!
Grenade! (laughter)
(crazed laughter)
Bombs! So many bombs!
Magic everyone! Magic!
Yes! Yes! Perfect!
Yes! Flee! Flee, cowards!
(laughter) Run cowards! Run!
That's right. Run cowards!
(evil laughter) Run cowards! Run!
How will you fight me when you're all so scared?
The fear is inside you!
Fear me! Poop, poop in your pumpkin pants!
(maniacal laughter)
(jolly evil laughter)
Basbus Brontu!
Bontu Barsoma!
Babmo Bibrundo!
Bravus Abimbus!
Barbo Cabarto!
Abo Alabasbas!
Lesbo Barrabus!
Barraparraf Brubus!
Binto Bartum!
Bemilus Bronte!
Mictor Ate!
Son of a...!
Herm!
Gah!
Gudah!
Uhhhh!
Ahhhhh!
Ooohhhhh!
Dawwwww!
Oughhhh!
Nooo!
Nooo!
Yaaah!
Ahhhh!
Oh the irony!
Ahhhh! You're still a fool!
Ahh!
Oww! Et tu head bombs?
Ahhhh!
Ahhhhhhhh!
Ah! Back! Stay back you fools!
Ah! Magic...powerless...against bombs!
Ooooh! I did not think this through.
Ahh! Well played! Fool.
Nyah! No, don't hit me with it!
Haaah!
No, that really hurt!
Aah! Ghost pain! It's worse than regular pain!
Bombinomicon! Betrayer!
Naaah! Oh, Judas book!
Ahh! Who told you to do that?
Naaah!
Ahh! So weak!
Fool! Your bombs are only making me weaker! (weak laughter) So weak!
Must hide and heal.
Must hide and heal.
Must hide. Get stronger.
Must hide. Must heal.
Must hide. Must heal.
Merasmus must hide.
Merasmus must hide.
No strength. Must hide.
No! This cannot be the end! Must hide.
Fools! I will come back stronger!
Fools! Do you not know you deal with the master of hiding!
Fools! Feel the terror of my hiding!
You cannot kill me fools! For I am great at hiding!
The hide-ening! It is here! Okay, need to find a hiding-spot.
Time to play hide-and-seek...your doom!
Must hide. Get stronger.
You have bested my magic! But can you withstand the dark power...of HIDING!
Demoman! Would you have your eye back? Come find me!
(malevolent laughter) The longer I hide. The stronger I get.
(liltingly) I'm healing! (dark laughter)
Muhahaha. I'm healing myself. With healing magic.
Muhahaha. I'm healing myself. With healing magic. And aspirin.
(weak laughter) The longer I hide, the stronger I get.
The fools! They have no idea how strong I'm getting. Or how loud...I'm..talking...
He he he! I'm getting stronger!
He he he he! I'm getting stronger!
Oh life courses back into my ghostly wizard veins!
Oh hiding heals my battered ghost body! It is a Halloween miracle!
If you don't find me soon, I'll get so strong I might die of strength (laughs) That's a real thing!
Fools! A wizard heals himself right under your noses!
Find me soon. I'm getting super strong and totally healed! (laughs) Hiding is the best!
Oh I am healing so much hiding as this pumpkin. Oh no! I gave it away! Or did I? So much mystery.
Aah, hiding...healing...I might never come out.
I am hiding, but as what? A pumpkin? A brick! Perhaps a harmless oil drum? Or a brick?
Come find me! If you dare!
I'm hiding. But where? So much mystery!
The terrifying hiding mystery...continues!
You'll never guess my disguise. It's too cunning!
Find me! ... Nope! Getting colder!
Find me! No, getting colder...colder...colder...colder!
You fools! You will never find me!
Fools! You'll never find me!
I am hidden somewhere in this eldritch realm. But where? Where?
Where could I be?
Hmmm. Where could the best wizard be hiding?
(evil laughter)
Oh I'm not there.
I'm inside your head!
Close. You're getting warmer!
You're close! Oh, so close! Or are you?
You're close! Oh, you're so close!
Hmm. Where could I be?
Where could Merasmus be?
Huzzah!
Surprise!
Wizard surprise!
Magic!
Emergis Exmortis!
Boo!
Boo!
Bulazbo!
Goodbye... Forever!
Alright, I'm leaving now.
Alright, I'm leaving now.
Goodbye, everyone!
Well, that was fun. Off I go!
Alright, goodbye everyone!
Enough! I leave.
A-ha! Too slow! I leave!
*Evil laugh* Goodbye, forever!
*Evil laugh* Goodbye, forever! *sotto voce* I'll see you at home, Soldier.
You have amused Merasmus, but now I must attend to other eldritch business. Farewell!
*Evil laugh* I bid you, farewell!
Farewell! Happy Halloween, everyone!
I leave you... to your doom!
Ach, no!
You win. No, wait, it's a tie! Argh...
Aaah!
Aaah!
Oooh!
Nyyaaagh! I hate you so much, Soldier!
You haven't heard the last of Merasmus the Magician!
I die, I diieeee... bye Soldier.
I die! Soldier, you were the wooorst roommate!
I die! I curse this land, for a hundred years!- No! A thousand! Thousand year-oh, I die!
Noooo!
Noooo!
Five.
Four!
Three!
Two!
One!

Greeting mortals! It is I, Merasmus! Do you think you've got what it takes to try the world's biggest strongman game? Because you don't! It's too big! No mortal is strong enough! (laughter) It was an unwise investment!
Welcome fools, to your doom! It is I, Merasmus! Behold! An ancient Sumerian strongman game! It is old! It it evil! And it is not free! Have your tickets ready.

Hello fools! It is I, Merasmus! Step right up, if you dare, and test your collective might against the world's biggest strongman game! Are you strong enough to discover how weak you are? If you don't buy a ticket, you'll never know!
Greetings mortals! It is I, Merasmus! I see you brought your guns! But are they big enough to best my ancient Sumerian strongman game? There's only one way to find out: get your tickets!
It is I, mortals, Merasmus the wizard! Welcome to my dark carnival of the macabre! Admit One...to MADNESS! (laughter) Step right up and test your measly might on my Strongmann Game of the Damned!

Good evening, mortals! Welcome to Merasmus' circus berzekus! My big top of beastly abominations! My carnival of carnage! (laughter) Test your miserable might on my infernal Strongmann Machine! (laughter)

Welcome mortals to my Magic Kingdom!...which is unaffiliated with any other Magic Kingdom that may or may not exist. Step right up and get your tickets from me! For I am the Ticket Master!...again, not a term Merasmus officially owns.

It is Halloween! The time of year when the doorways between our world and the next swing wide! That...and President's Day. That's still only two times! So you've got to pick your battles if you're Merasmus!

Greetings mortals...and こんにちは! Yes, Merasmus is learning Japanese...in the likely event that he will have to beg for his life! Why? Well, therein lies a tale of horror! Short version: Merasmus owes $12,000 to the Japanese Mafia!

A harvest moon hangs pendulously in the sky, mortals! That's right, the moon's giving us the green light for harvesting! Apropos of nothing, I hope you all brought your souls! (laughter) And money. Because Merasmus has sunk a lot into this circus.
Oh good, you're back! That last time I transported you to a nightmare realm of bumper car madness! This time, I promise not to. Go get a Ticket for the Strongmann game!

Hah! I tricked you! You thought Merasmus was giving you an innocent circus ride! And instead it was a hellish bumper car slaughter! OK! Go get another ticket for the Strongmann game! This time I'm not tricking you.
I hope you brought your souls with you! Why? Oh no reason! (laughter) *sotto voce* Oh, I'm going to take their souls. It's going to be so good! Score one for Merasmus!
Go on. Pretend Merasmus isn't even here. Kill everyone like you would normally.
'I don't think any of you are strong enough to best my Strongmann game! Signed: Merasmus.' That's right, I'm having this speech notarized as we speak! It's official: you are too weak!
No Ticket, no ride! Do you think an evil circus runs on souls? Because it does! But not entirely. Mostly it runs on electricity and that costs money.

You know what runs on souls? Inter-dimensional doorways to dark realms beyond the knowing of man! You know what doesn't run on souls? Lightbulbs. They still still use electricity and that costs money. No Ticket, no ride.
Yes, yes! Keep killing each other! Look at those bodies piling up! This will be the greatest circus graveyard of all time! Screw you ancient Sumeria!

Can you even trust your own senses? Imagine stepping back from a skeleton you've just knifed to death. Only it is your best friend! That's the kind of psychological thrills you can expect every night at Merasmus' dark circus!
Bonzo, the ancient Sumerian circus god, are you not entertained? What's that? No? You aren't? You there! Spy! Stab somebody!
I summon thee, Bonzo, the ancient Sumerian circus god! Look on my works and arise! No? Later then, Bonzo. You there! Soldier! Kill somebody!
Ugh, I don't have time for you to die of natural causes! You there! Demoman! Bomb someone!
Most villains don't think they're evil. They think they're heroes. Not me! I'm reclaiming it! Evil wizard! I'm rotten to the bone and I don't care who knows it!

Look how good you are at killing, mortals! You must be very successful and rich! You could help Merasmus rise from the murky depths of his financial grave! But I warn you, it's twelve thousand dollars deep! Mwa ha ha ha ha ha haaaa...oh no.

Yes, yes! Ancient Sumerian burial ground, my magic ass! By midnight, the circus will be an American graveyard! You're not the only country that can put bodies in a hole, Ancient Sumeria! Buy American everyone!

Do you know what's scarier than a spectral ghoul glimpsed on a moonlit night? The Japanese Mafia! They are not spectral! They are very real! And they are coming to break Merasmus' legs, unless I give them $12,000! Awooo! Aw aw awoo! Help me!
Bonzo, appear! Appear before us! Just try not to appear between the Japanese Mafia and the $12,000 I owe them! They will break all seventeen of your arms!

Here's a chilling Halloween tale: Once upon a time, an innocent evil wizard named Merasmus bought a circus for $12000, hoping to flip it and make a fortune! Alas, he did not have $12,000, but do you know who did? The Japanese Mafia! But, due to a language barrier, Merasmus was unclear about the frankly punitive interest rates! Welcome to my financial nightmare, mortals! Awwooo ho ho ho ho (crying)...what am I going to do..?

Attention: foolish mortals! If you see any Japanese people around, let Merasmus know! Because that is the Japanese Mafia! At best, they are here to break his legs! And that is the best-case scenario! It gets a lot, lot darker from there...a lot darker.

Look at you! You're a veritable Murderers' Row of killers! I'll have my graveyard in no time! First, you get the graveyard! Then you get the customers! Then you get the $12,000 to pay back the Japanese Mafia! They burned Merasmus' apartment down! They're animals, mortals!

Just look at those souls of yours! Wasting away in those big, stupid bodies! Oh the things I could do with them! The only thing I can't do is pay off the Japanese Mafia with them. Ha ha! They made that very explicit...American currency only.

My circus isn't very safe, is it? Too bad you can't file a complaint with the Better Business Bureau! Because...wait, I suppose there's nothing stopping you, is there? Well, it appears Merasamus didn't think this through...

Be afraid, mortals! Bonzo, the ancient Sumerian circus god, is coming! You know who's not scared of Bonza? The Japanese Mafia! They don't appear to be scared of anything. Except not getting the money I owe them. (nervously) And even that just seems to make them angry...

I hope you signed your release forms, fools, indemnifying Merasmus in the events of your deaths! (laughter) Because otherwise, I'm in a lot of trouble...Merasmus has two strikes...I will go to jail...FOREVER!

You thought you were going to test your strength! But instead, I tricked you, again! (laughter) Alright, I've had my fun. This time the Strongmann game will only test your strength. No more teleporting you to eldritch bumper car realms.
(cackling) You fell for it, again! (breathless with laughter) And to reward your gullibility, this time, I promise nothing supernatural will happen when you use the Strongmann game. Ah hah.

Ah ha ha ha ha! You must know the Strongman's a secret portal to eldritch bumper car realms at this point! And you're still doing it! (laughter) I'm starting to think you guys just like killing each other... Ah hah!

(evil laughter) OK. OK! I've lost track of how many times I've tricked you into activating the evil bumper car portal at this point! (chuckle) But this time...you know what...it's still a trick! Ah ha hah!
Get ready to test your strength!
Tickets for the Strongmann game are almost on sale!
Merasmus' dark and eldritch circus of the macabre is open! No refunds!!
Go, go! Test your strength!
Yes, yes! Kill everyone! Kill anyone! Kill everything that isn't dead!
Go get your tickets! Kill everyone in your way!
The Strongmann! MisFortune Telling! The Necromasher! My circus has it all!
Merasmus' dark carnival...is open! (cackling)
(laughter) Welcome lambs...TO THE SLAUGHTERHOUSE...for lambs!
Merasmus' dark carnival...IS OPEN! (laughter)
Go, the gate is up! Run fools! Get your Tickets!
What are your waiting for? Go get you Tickets!
Go get your Tickets! The price is MURDER! (laughter and howling)
'Get your Tickets! If you dare!
Tickets are now on sale, mortals!
Step right up and get your Tickets! Mwah ha ha ha ha ha!
Get your Tickets! (laughter) Awoo! Hoo hoo!
Tickets are available for pickup!
Get your Tickets, fools!
(maniacal laughter) Hurry! Get your Tickets!
Get your Tickets...If you dare!
Tickets are now available!
Step right up and get your Tickets! (cackling)
Go! Get the Tickets!
The Tickets are waiting, mortals!
Why has nobody claimed their Tickets?!
Go get the Tickets!
The Tickets are waiting, mortals!
Tickets are on sale again!
Tickets are available for pickup again!
The Tickets are back!
The Tickets...Have Returned!
The Tickets are back! Go get them!
The Tickets have returned! What are you waiting for?
You've got the Tickets! Get them to the Strongmann!
You've got the Tickets! Get them to the top of the Strongmann!
You've got the Tickets! Get them to the lift!
You have the Tickets! Now get to the ride!
The Tickets are yours! Now, get to the top of the ride!
You've got the Tickets! Get them to the top of the lift!
The Tickets are yours! Now get to the ride!
Fools! The enemy has the Tickets!
Fools! The enemy has taken the Tickets!
They've got the Tickets!
They've got the Tickets! Kill them!
They've got the Tickets! Kill them!
Your team has dropped your Tickets!
Your team dropped the Tickets!
You team just dropped the Tickets!
Your team has dropped your Tickets!
Hurry! They've dropped the tickets!
Fools! The enemy dropped the Tickets!
The enemy has dropped the Tickets!
Hurry! They've dropped the Tickets!
You team has made it to the lift!
Your team got the Tickets to the lift!
Your team is on the lift!
Yes! Your team's on the lift!
Your team has started the lift! Get ready to test your strength!
Your team is on the lift! Nothing can stop you now! Except the other team and their guns!
Your team started the lift!
(laughter) Your team is starting the ride!
Your team is activating the Strongmann!
You're starting the Strongmann! (laughter) Fools!...I mean good! Good stuff!
You team is unlocking the ride!
Your team is unlocking the Strongmann!
The enemy's made it to the lift!
The enemy got their Tickets to the lift!
The enemy is on the lift!
The enemy is on the lift!
Fools! The enemy is on the lift!
The enemy team's on the lift, you fools!
The enemy's made it to the lift! Stop them!
The enemy's started the lift!
Hurry! The enemy's about to start the Strongmann!
The enemy's trying to start the ride!
The enemy team is starting the Strongmann!
The enemy is starting the Strongmann! Quickly, kill them all!
The enemy has almost started the Strongmann! Hurry! Slaughter them!
The enemy is close to activating the Strongmann! Stop them! And kill them! And stop them!
The enemy has almost activated the Strongmann! They can't do it if they're dead! (laughter)
The enemy's unlocking the ride!
The enemy's unlocking the Strongmann!
Fools! This innocent Strongmann game was in actuality a necromantic portal to a kill-crazy realm of murder! You just got Merasmus'd!
Fools! The only strength you've been testing is the strength of your gullibility! Stand by for bumper-car madness!
RED wins...a first-class ticket to a kill-crazy realm of bumper cars and murder! That's right, you just got Merasmus'd
You did it RED team! And because you won, you have the honor of pole position in a bumper car slaughterhouse where I kill you all! Ah ha ha ha ha ha!
Nice hustle RED team! Your reward is a slight advantage in a game I specifically invented to kill all of you! Again, congratulations. ALRIGHT LET'S DO IT!
RED wins! Big picture though: you all lose because now you're about to bumper-fight for Merasmus' amusement! Hold onto your Skull Hats everyone!
RED wins! And now I send you to a realm of bumper-car insanity! No bumps barred! NO RULES! Please keep your hands inside the vehicle at all times though.
Yes, RED team! You've won yourself the advantage in a game of bumper cars...designed to kill every one of you! So enjoy that early lead!
What a come-from-behind win! Team RED is a Cinderella story tonight, mortals! R! E! D! What's it spell? Who! Cares! OK, time to kill you!
Wooo! Who saw that coming! RED snags a win! I thought BLU had that locked up! What an upset! Woo ho, well, time to die! Still though, that was close guys.
BLU wins! Enjoy your victory lap...to the grave! Courtesy of my bumper cars of the damned!
BLU wins! And now I transport you to a racetrack slick with blood and entrails! Yours! Welcome fools, to bumper car madness!
BLU wins! And that means you get a slight advantage at the start of my bumper car game. Then you'll die! To summarize: small advantage to BLU. Then I'll kill you!
Well done BLU team! You've won yourself the advantage in a bumper car game! A game where I plan to KILL ALL OF YOU! And feed your souls to an evil circus god!
BLU wins! Big picture though: you all lose because now you're about to bumper-fight for Merasmus' amusement! Hold onto your Skull Hats everyone!
You did it BLU team! And because you won, you have the honor of pole position in a game I devised to kill all of you!
Congratulations BLU team! You've won a very small advantage in a game I'm about to transport you all to. Footnote that, the game will most likely kill all of you!
Congrats BLU team! I'm sending you all to a bumper-car slaughterhouse! And you'll get a small advantage at the start of it! (laughter) No, no, no. Don't thank me. After all I am going to kill you.
Yes!
YES!
No!
NO!
Yes! Yes, yes, yes!
No, no, no, no, no!
Damn you!
No, wait!
Don't do that!
Don't do that!
Kill them!
Stop them!
Stop them!
Argh! Blast!
Why? Why would you do that?
Perfect!
Excellent!
EXCELLENT!
Get them!
GET THEM!
Attack!
Attack!
Attack them!
ATTACK THEM!
Destroy them!
Quickly, get rid of it!
Hurry, get rid of it!
Incoming spell!
Spell coming at you!
Incoming spell, mortals!
Incoming spell!
Incoming spell!
Big heads!
Big heads! (wicked laughter)
Big balloon heads! Haha! Hilarious!
'Big balloon heads! Ahhh! Ha, ha, ha, ha! Merasmus, you've done it again!
Cranius Giganto!
Big heads for everybody!

Balloon Head spell! And that's just a taste of the spells I've been cooking up! Merasmus's getting a lot of buzz from some pretty big magical universities right now. I don't want to name drop...Hogwarts is very interested!

Balloon Heads! Just a little spell I cooked up last night. Oh what's that, Gandalf? You can't make people's heads into balloons? Ah ha ha! Well maybe you should cry hot tears into your stupid beard, because Merasmus is the best!
Full disclosure: I've just filled your heads with eight gallons of pickle brine! Wait, wait, wait, before you jump down my throat, you should know, it didn't cost me a thing!
This is one of those glass-half-empty scenarios! Downside, yes I just inflated all of your heads! Upside though, because I don't want you to worry, my head is fine.
Now what I've done here is inflate your head then fill the cavity with rotten garbage. I think I speak for everyone when I say, 'Damn you Merasmus! (claps!) You've done it again!  Home run!'
No guns!
No guns! (laughter)
No guns! (maniacal laughter)
Nonus artilleriso!
No guns!
Merasmus talks about guns like you ain't got none, mortals! That's because I sold them all! (laughter)
Your precious Second Amendment won't help you now, Soldier. No guns! For anyone!
Merasmus banishes your guns! (laughter) This isn't a Second Amendment thing by the way, it's non-politically motivated evil!
Merasmus banishes your guns to the nether realms! Forever! Or perhaps only momentarily! Merasmus printed this spell off the Internet!
Underwater!
Underwater!
Underwater! (laughter)
Underwater! (cackling)
Sumarinus Jaratitos!
Under-water!
Swim mortals! Swim underwater until I... Oh. Oh, no! That's, that's not water, is it? Oh. Merasmus is so very, very sorry.
Swim for Mersasmus' amusement, mortals! (laughter) Oh. Oh no! That is...that is not water. Uh, Merasmus, all...well all Merasmus can do is apologize.
An ocean of water descends upon you. Drown mortals! Drown in...in... Hmm. Ok, all cards on the table, that was supposed to be water. I'm so sorry.
Yes! Bump! Bump your padded cars to a padded grave!
The precious padding of your bumpy cars can't save you now! Unless you have padding on your very souls!
Bump, mortals! Bump for Bonzo's amusement! He is easily entertained! Ah ha ha ha ha!
These bumper cars have no brakes! A) Because they move relatively slowly, but B) Because there are no rules!
Don't forget to buckle-up mortals! Oh wait, there's no seat-belts! (laughter) Enjoy your five-mile-an-hour death ride!
Bump away in these bumper cars, fools! Bump yourselves to madness!
These are no normal bumper cars! They will bump you to the edge of sanity itself!
Go for a spin, mortals, in my smack carts of the black arts! My scream machines! My bumper cars! (laughter)
Strap in mortals to my vile vessels of vehicular villainy! My damnation wagons! My bumper scars! (laughter)
Take a seat mortals in my murder machines of malevolent mayhem! My hearses with curses! My bumper scars!
I hope none of you are pregnant or have an existing heart condition! Because you about to be jostled like you've never been jostled before!
Welcome, mortals to my stationary cars! Oh no wait, they're bumper cars! Mwa ha ha ha ha ha! Get ready for the bumping of your life!
Go ahead and try the brakes! They won't work! You're trapped in a runaway bumper car! Strap in for a five-mile-an-hour Hell ride!
Don't fall off the track, mortals! Bonzo's hungry tonight! Especially for you, Spy! Bonzo loves French food!
I'd love to join you down there, mortals, but I have a heart condition and the rules are clearly posted. I'm with you, it's ridiculous. Write your congressman!
I don't want to scare you, but bumper cars aren't meant to go this fast! (laughter) That's right, they're non-OSHA-compliant! Awoooo!
Strap in mortals to my thumper cars! They're not as fast as actual cars, but faster than a bumper car is meant to go! So...that's... still pretty scary!
Welcome to the Looting Gallery!
Welcome to the Looting Gallery! (laughter)
Welcome, mortals, to the Looting Gallery!
Welcome to the Looting Gallery! Collect Ducks to win! Kill the other team to win! Do whatever! It takes! To win! Because believe me, you don't want to lose!

Welcome to the Looting Gallery, mortals! Whoever gets the most Ducks wins! Whoever gets the least ducks, does not win! I'm assuming that you're all a little dim, so Merasmus is laying this out as simply as possible.
Welcome to the Looting Gallery! The team that captures the most prizes wins! The team that pushes the other team off the track, shrieking to their deaths, also wins! But much, much faster!
Bonus Ducks!
Bonus Ducks!
Bonus Ducks!
I've moved the Ducks!
I've moved the Ducks!
The Ducks have moved, mortals!
The Ducks... have moved. mortals!
Now the Ducks are over here!
The Ducks...HAVE MOVED!
The Ducks have moved elsewhere!
Now the Ducks...are over there!
Now the Ducks are over there!
RED grabbed the most Ducks! RED wins!
You got the most Ducks, RED! You win!
BLU grabbed the most Ducks! BLUE wins!
Falling Platforms!
Welcome, to Falling Platforms! (laughter)
Welcome to a game I call: Falling Platforms! (evil laughter)
One of these platforms won't plunge you to to your doom! (cackling)
One of these platforms will be your salvation! The others will plunge you to your doom!
Only one of these platforms won't plunge you to your death! Can you find it in time? If I were you, I'd give it a shot!
All but one of these platforms will fall into the abyss below you! But which one? (laughter) If the fall doesn't kill you, the suspense will!
Welcome to a game I call Falling Platforms for a reason that is shrouded in mystery. But will soon be very...very incredibly obvious!
The goal of this game is simple: one of these platforms...won't plummet you to your doom! The others...will plummet your to your doom!
These aren't normal platforms, mortals! All of them...are evil! Except for one! Which is nice! The evil ones will plunge you to your doom! The nice one...will remain stationary!
None of these platforms will suddenly plunge you to your death! You're perfectly safe! Drive slowly mortals and chat amongst yourselves!
Go, go, go, go! It's that one!
There, that one! Go, go, go, go!
There! There, there, there, there, there, there!
Oh there! That one! That one! THAT ONE!
Oh, it's that one! Go, go, go, go, go!
AH! That one! Go! Go, go, go!
There it is! Hurry you fools! Hurry!
There is it! Hurry you fools, hurry!
Ooh! There! That one! That one!
You all win! At failing! Time to die mortals!
The Headless Horseless Horsemann!
The Headless Horseless Horsemann, everyone!
Kill them all, Horsemann!
Enough! I summon the Headless! Horseless! Horsemann!
Kill them all, Horsemann!
Bumper Cars Soccer!
Bumper Cars Soccer, everyone!
Bumper Cars Soccer! Awoo!
(evil laughter) Bumper Cars Soccer!
Ancient Sumerian Bumper Cars Soccer!
The time has come! For Ancient Sumerian Bumper Car Death Soccer!
Welcome to Soccer, mortals! Or as we call it in the dark realms before time: Sumerian Rules Bumpy Car Football!

MeRASmission!
Were I to utter the details of this contract aloud, the tiny world you know would be rent asunder! Welcome to your nightmare, mortal! READING!

Don't look too closely at this Merasmission! It is infested with a host of Hellworms; your human scientists would call Silverfish! Yes mortal, there was significant water damage in Merasmus' storage unit!

What's that sound? Is it the scratching of fingernails on a casket lid, because they were buried alive? They might just be... Oh wait mortal, where are your fingers! Look down! That's right! It was you buried in that coffin! 'The whole *BLEEEP* time!
Practice evil itself! Though not legally enforceable. Merasmus didn't go to law school. He got his diploma on the streets; the streets of HELL!
A gibbous moon hangs pendulously in the night sky! It thinks you cannot finish this contract! Dare you make the moon look stupid?

Tonight the barriers are down! Between known and the unknown! The real and the unreal! The paid debts and the unpaid debts to the Russian Mafia! (cackling laughter) They put Merasmus in a trunk, mortal.
Dear mortal: Everything you love will be dead by dawn. Signed: Merasmus! Post Script: I'll still be alive. Because I don't even like you!
Hold on a second, Gandalf! I'll need to give some loser a contract! Sorry, I was just on the phone with Gandalf! You know, The Grey. A very good friend. It's...uh...I can tell you're impressed.

What's that Harry Potter? I'm the best wizard and you're just a big stupid pile of garbage? (light laughter) That's big of you to admit that, Harry Potter. Hold on, I need to give some bozo a contract.
Tremble mortal, at the fathomless evil pulsating in the gulfs of this unholy contact! (wicked laughter) IT'S DOUBLE-SPACED!
Do you feel it tightening around your neck? This contract is BINDING, mortal!
An unholy contract, written in blood! Signed in triplicate! Notarized from beyond the grave!
This contract isn't just evil. It's legally binding! In every state, but Hawaii! (wicked laughter) Aloha, mortal!
Does your backside feel warm, mortal? It should, because this contract just put you in the hot seat!
[nonchalantly] Oh hello, Sauron! What's that? Yes, Merasmus, has,  been working out. It's flattering you noticed. I, hold on, need to give some mercenary a contract.

Tonight you will visit the realms of Halloweens past. Remember when I got Demo's eyeball to attack you all? That was pretty evil! Or that time I used my connections and got the Horseless Headless Horsemann to show up! (laughter) Wow, that's evil!

Tonight you will visit the realms of Halloweens past. Like that time Soldier turned my evil castle into a raccoon sanctuary! Ah hah. Everyone remember that? That was a, a bad day for Merasmus. It took a while to walk that one off.
Here's a contract I like to call: 'Your certain doom!'
I hope your soul's in good shape, mortal! Because when you fail at this, I'll be taking it off your hands! (laughter)
You will never beat me! And I will claim your soul!
You dare to fight me? Oh mortal, this is going to be embarrassing!
So you think you've got what it takes to beat Merasmus, eh? Your funeral, mortal! Your sparsely attended pauper's funeral!
Your challenge is to defeat me! But you can't! And when you fail, I'll take your soul!
(cackling) That's all I have to say about this next contract! Oh wait, one more thing! Awoooo!
Your next target is me! Merasmus!
Your next target: me! (laughter) Awoooo! (more laughter)
Cower mortal, before the eldritch horror of the abject terror of the monstrous magic...of Merasmus!
You next infernal contract is...hold on...let's see...killing...me. Huh. I am surprised I put that one in there.
Either you kill my past self and I get my soul, or my past self kills you and I get yours! (laughter) I don't *BLEEEP* care! I'm all about souls tonight!
Should you fail mortal, you'll be in breach of contract. And I shall seek compensation, in the form of your soul! (laughter) And financial...compensation. Merasmus is living at the Y.
That's a nice soul you have there! It would be a shame if a wizard were to claim it, when you fail this mission!

Bet you'll win this contract? Would you wager your very soul? (cackling) Please note that I'm not explicitly threatening you or you'll be agreeing to this contract under duress. That..wooo..that would not be good for Merasmus.
Exterior: A graveyard. We zoom in on a corpse holding a bloodstained contract. The corpse is yours! That's right! Merasmus has been working on a great screenplay!
